title: Freezing ingame
body:
Hey Guys i have a little problem with my LoL
Ingame sometimes my screen frezzes for about 2 sek and after that i can just play further.
That happens ca 8 times a game and sometimes after 2 hours plaing my Pc just shuts down.
i had the assumption that it is because of my cooling system (that it doesnt work  as good as it should or things like that) and also my PC is 5 jears old.
If u have any tipps or hints for me or had the same problem pls let me know.
Thx Community

replies.body: Your PC shutting down is pretty serious, and might be doing it as a safety precaution in case of some kind of hardware failure.  It may actually be due to overheating, so it's important to have that checked out.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will take a look with you.  We'll reply back asap!
